lstDialogOne: We help the peasents in the kingdom
Today we are fund raising for the unemployed plebs out on the streets
Care to donate just 3 coins to help the needy?|c
lstOutcomeYesText: Hehe, awesome. I'll put the plebs to work immediatly
lstOutcomeNoText: Thats a shame, I'll be back soon with no doubt another noble cause
lstCantAffordText: Oh dear, it looks like you can't afford to help m-I mean..the needy
